verses.verse: If<WH3884> it had not been Yahweh<WH3068> who was on our side,<WH3478> let Israel now say,<WH559>
if<WH3884> it had not been Yahweh<WH3068> who was on our side,<WH120> when men rose up against us;<WH6965>
then<WH233> they would have swallowed us up<WH1104> alive,<WH2416> when their wrath<WH639> was kindled against us;<WH2734>
then<WH233> the waters<WH4325> would have overwhelmed<WH7857> us,<WH5158> the stream would have gone over<WH5674> our soul;<WH5315>
then<WH233> the proud<WH2121> waters<WH4325> would have gone over<WH5674> our soul.<WH5315>
Blessed<WH1288> be Yahweh,<WH3068> who has not given<WH5414> us as a prey<WH2964> to their teeth.<WH8127>
Our soul<WH5315> has escaped<WH4422> like a bird<WH6833> out of the fowler<WH3369>'s snare.<WH6341> The snare<WH6341> is broken,<WH7665> and we have escaped.<WH4422>
Our help<WH5828> is in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh,<WH3068> who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth.<WH776>
